body:
### Hi, I'm Cameron Bentley, aka. DJCoder.
I'm an aspiring programmer and web developer. I learnt most of my stuff from books, the internet, and boredom. 
I have achieved a number of really cool things with computers, and I will only now be entering the open source playground. 

### Cool stuff I've made
In the past, I've made:
 - A video game in CryEngine 3 (although rather small at 2 levels :D)
 - Android and WP7 app (restaurant saver - saves memorable restaurants into a favorite list and suggets them in the future)
 - XDA handset development - I have done quite some work debugging Android bugs on XDA ported roms
 - Made an app for a school project
 - Many more things that were probably only cool as I had achieved them!

### About Me
I'm a 14-year old. I live in Canada, but have traveled around most of the world - I was born in Hong Kong to my British parents, and we lived there for a few years before moving to the UK, and not long ago out to Canada.

### Thanks
Thanks to:
 - My parents for their immense support when I was tearing my face off at CryEngine's AI system!
 - My friends for helping with projects
 - XDA-Developers.com
 - And more people who I've forgotten and/or not appreciated :) (sorry)

### Contact
Email: me@djcoder.com

### Thanks for stopping by!
I hope I've left a good impression! Have a great day,
 -Cameron
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: DJCoder
